intro.description: This cheat-sheet shows the steps required to create a new Domain Models Project (Tier 2).

item.title: Open the Domain Expert (Tier 2) perspective
item.description: The domain-models project requires the Domain Expert (Tier 2) perspective to be opened (otherwise not all related commands will be visible).

item.title: Create a new Domain-Models Project (Tier 2)
item.description: A new Domain-Models Project (Tier 2) can be created using the respective wizard (follow the instructions in the wizard).

item.title: Model Services and Communication Objects
item.description: Here you should specify your model contents by defining Services, Communication Objects and other Tier 2 domain model elements.

item.title: Execute C++ Code Generation
item.description: Now run the C++ code generator to generate C++ code from the current models.

item.title: Build Project
item.description: Now trigger the project build, which will automatically execute CMake and make for the current project and by that compile the generated C++ code.
